CACS301.question: How properties like ubiquity, richness and information density make e-commerce better than traditional commerce?
Differentiate B2C, B2B and C2C e-commerce with examples
What is the role of information superhighway in e-commerce? List the components of information superhighway?
What is international information system? Describe the concepts of outsourcing and offshoring in the system.
Define availability, authentication and authorization. How they can be enforced in e-commerce security?
What is e-checking? Describe its working mechanism.
Describe the website design criteria that one should show while designing an e-commerce website.
What do you mean by Wireless Application Protocol (WAP)? How it works? Discuss the layered architecture of WAP.
How important web contents are for e-commerce systems? Discuss their types. Justify, with examples, how web contents can be used to promote cross-selling, up-selling and promotions in e-commerce.
Discuss in detail the security defends strategies that you can implement while securing e-commerce systems from security attacks and threats.

CAMG304.question: What is management? Explain the functions of management.
Define scientific management. Explain the major contributions made by F.W. Taylor.
Describe the formal and informal group with suitable example.
What is planning? Discuss the steps involved in planning process.
What are the barriers of effective communication in any organizations? Explain.
Why is motivation important to achieve organizational goals?
Define delegation of authority. Explain major features of delegation of authority.
Planning is head and controlling is tail. Justify.
Define leadership. Explain different style of leadership with suitable example.
What are managerial skills? What skills  are essential for a successful manager.

CACS305.question: What is computer graphics? Explain different application areas of computer graphics.
How can you draw a circle using mid-point circle algorithm? Explain with the algorithm.
Explain 3D basic geometric transformation with an example.
What is polygon clipping? Explain Sutherland Hodgman algorithm for polygon clipping.

Given a triangle with vertices A(2,3), B(5,5), C(4,3) by rotating 90 degree about the origin and then translating two unit in each direction. Use homogenous transformation matrix to find the new vertices of the triangle.
Explain the scan line algorithm for visible surface detection.
Explain the architecture of VR system with necessary components.
Explain the working details of DDA line drawing algorithm? Digitize the line with endpoints (2,2) and (10,5) using Bresenham's line drawing algorithm.
Write the different between object space method and image space method. Explain Z buffer algorithm for visible surface detection.

Derive the formula for windows to viewport transformation. Given a window bordered by (0,0) at the lower left and (4,4) at the upper right. Similarly, a viewport bordered by (0,0) at the lower left and (2,2) at the upper right. If a window at position (2,4) is mapped into the viewport. What will be the position of viewport to maintain same relative placement as in window?

CACS351.question: What do you mean by mobile device? Explain its features.
What do you mean by mobile programming? Explain life cycle of mobile application development.
What is android platform? Explain about history of android platform in detail.
How we can setup environment for android? Explain.
What do you mean by view hierarchy? Explain with the help of suitable example.
Define widget. Explain different widget attributes with example.
How can we create string resources? Explain with the help of suitable example.
Write a set of codes for creating activity. Also link xml file “activity_main.xml” to this activity.
Explain about manifest file. How can we add activity in manifest? Explain with example.
What is the role of intent-filter for any activity? Explain.
Explain the procedure for creating an AVD. Also write steps for running application on Emulator.
What do you mean by layout? List and explain different types of layout used in android with their major attributes.
Differentiate LinearLayout, RelativeLayout, ConstraintLayout, AbsoluteLayout with example.
Explain any five widgets with their attributes in detail.
What do you mean by event? Explain event handling in detail.
How can you use string and string array in android? Explain.
How can you use color in android? Explain.
Differentiate string and string array with example.
Explain the procedure for adding and displaying image in imageview. Also writecode snippet to add icon to your project.
Design a signup form using Relative, Linear, Absolute and Constraint Layout.
Design a simple UI for Book Entry in library.
Design a simple UI for patient registration in hospital.
Display the following data using TableLayout. {{Student Id, Name, Address, Gender}, {001, Ram Sharma, Birtamode, Male}, {002, Gita Sharma, Kathmandu, Female}}
Design a simple calculator UI using TableLayout.
What do you mean by android activity? Explain android activity life cycle in detail.
How can you declare multiple activities in manifest? Explain.
What do you mean by intent? Explain.
How can you pass data between multiple activities using intent? Explain.
Develop an android application which get result back from a child activity.

Develop an android application to calculate simple interest. Your application should contain fields to input principal, rate, time and button for event handling. Calculate and display result in a TextView.

Develop an android application to calculate area and perimeter of rectangle. Your application should contain fields to input length and breadth and two buttons for calculating area and perimeter. Calculate and display result in a TextView.

Design a signup form using any layout of your choice.
	- Your design must include important widgets like TextView, EditText, Button, RadioButton, CheckBox, Spinner etc.
	- When user clicks a Button display inputted data in a TextView.

Develop a simple calculator application with two input fields for inputting numbers and four Buttons for performing addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Display the result in a TextView.
Develop an android application to input your name, address, gender and other personal information. Pass and display this information in another activity.
